title: Tatami Time Machine Blues - Novel Updates
tags: Apartment Life   Cautious Protagonist   College/University   Crossover   Delusions   Flashbacks   Friendship   Time Travel   Youkai
author: Morimi Tomihiko   Ueda Makoto   上田誠   森見登美彦
description:
Summer. Kyoto. Inferno. Air conditioner. Ozu. Cola. Despair. Time machine. Akashi. Time machine!? Opportunity. Akashi. Universe. Salvation? Obliteration? Akashi?

The long awaited follow-up to The Tatami Galaxy. Based on Summer Time Machine Blues, a (screen)play by frequent Morimi collaborator Ueda Makoto.>
